alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Neshoba; Noxubee; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 4:20AM CDT until June 15 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN NOXUBEE...KEMPER...SOUTHERN WINSTON...NESHOBA AND NORTHERN LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 420 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pearl River, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Philadelphia around 425 AM CDT. Burnside and Stallo around 430 AM CDT. Nanih Waiya around 440 AM CDT. Forestdale around 445 AM CDT. Preston around 450 AM CDT. Bluff Springs around 455 AM CDT. Liberty around 500 AM CDT. De Kalb around 505 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
